title: Ep. 103 - The Duke and I (Inspired Bridgerton Season 1!)
itunes:title: Ep. 103 - The Duke and I (Inspired Bridgerton Season 1!)
description:
Hey HBs! This week we're rereleasing our episode on The Duke and I by Julia Quinn because a) we're so stoked for the Bridgerton Series coming to Netflix next year, b) it's the birth of "England Times," and c) we're just as thankful to everyone who listens now as we were then! WE LOVE YOU, LISTENER! Thank you for loving this wonderful genre as much as we do!
 So, are you a sucker for a rakish Duke, a lady who can throw a punch, and a fake dating scheme? We are TOO! 
 Content Warning: sexual assault, miscarriage
 Self-Love Recommendations: 
 - Ginger-infused tea; it'll cure what ails you! 
 - Listen to episode 7 of Queery with Cameron Esposito; it's an interview with Stephanie Beatriz about bisexuality, bi-erasure, acting, and "being shitty with yourself" in order to succeed. So good! 
 Patreon Shout Out: 
 Tanya GM, you are an Ogopogo, a legendary Canadian lake serpent demon that is basically living its best life. You are about 40 million years old and probably immortal, so you don't take any shit from anybody. And if you love somebody for a thousand years like in that Twilight wedding song, it would basically be a blip on your radar. Coolest of all, even though you are a fierce, reclusive, deadly beast, people love you and want to put you on T-Shirts and use you as a mascot. You're both feared and loved, which is basically the dream. Your name is also a palindrome, so that's pretty cool.
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)

Hey HBs! This week we're rereleasing our episode on The Duke and I by Julia Quinn because a) we're so stoked for the Bridgerton Series coming to Netflix next year, b) it's the birth of "England Times," and c) we're just as thankful to everyone who listens now as we were then! WE LOVE YOU, LISTENER! Thank you for loving this wonderful genre as much as we do!

So, are you a sucker for a rakish Duke, a lady who can throw a punch, and a fake dating scheme? We are TOO! 

Content Warning: sexual assault, miscarriage

Self-Love Recommendations: 

- Ginger-infused tea; it'll cure what ails you! 

- Listen to episode 7 of Queery with Cameron Esposito; it's an interview with Stephanie Beatriz about bisexuality, bi-erasure, acting, and "being shitty with yourself" in order to succeed. So good! 

Patreon Shout Out: 

Tanya GM, you are an Ogopogo, a legendary Canadian lake serpent demon that is basically living its best life. You are about 40 million years old and probably immortal, so you don't take any shit from anybody. And if you love somebody for a thousand years like in that Twilight wedding song, it would basically be a blip on your radar. Coolest of all, even though you are a fierce, reclusive, deadly beast, people love you and want to put you on T-Shirts and use you as a mascot. You're both feared and loved, which is basically the dream. Your name is also a palindrome, so that's pretty cool.
